definition: to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

sentences.english: This is most likely prolapsed fallopian tube .
sentences.chinese: 这个很可能是脱垂的输卵管。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical manifestation of mitral valve prolapse syndrome.

sentences.english: It is recommended for women with mild to moderate prolapse.

sentences.english: Objective To study clinical presentations and complications of prolapse of gastric mucosa.

sentences.english: One complication which can arise is a prolapse.

sentences.english: Objective to investigate the reason and clinical significance of tricuspid valve prolapse in the aged.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨老年人三尖瓣脱垂的原因及临床意义。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss CT features of patients with spontaneous subconjunctival orbital fat prolapse.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨原发性结膜下眶脂肪脱垂的CT表现。

sentences.english: For more on what to do if the cord is prolapsed, see page 565.

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate excision-closed hemorrhoidectomy for severe prolapsed circumferential hemorrhoids by using stapler device.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨适合严重脱垂环状痔的手术方法。

sentences.english: Prolapse is a complication that can occur in women.

sentences.english: These are known as prolapsed or prolapsing haemorrhoids.

sentences.english: Stoma prolapse is a common late complication following loop transverse colostomy.

definition: sigmoid colon (anatomy)/bent colon, linking the descending colon to the rectum
